Original Ultima relase installs AUTOMATICALLY.                        

    1. Burn ISO images or copy them to single HDD folder.                  
    2. Install the game (plus, if you want, FR/PL language from 2nd CD).  
    3. Insert ANY CD into the drive (Jimmy Hendrix Oldies But Goldies)    
    4. Enjoy our work like we did.
